text: Ædward kyning grett ælle mine wytan gehadode & lewede.

Ænd ic cyþe eow þæt ic hebbe bicweðen Portland & eall þæt ðerto bilyð in to Gealden Mynstre on Wyncheastre Gode to lofe & Sancte Petre & Sancte Suuthune þam monekan to scrudan & to fodan for mynre sawle & for ealre mynra maga & for ælre ðere kynga sawle þe æfter me þyses kynyngriches wældeð.
La hwo ðisne cwidan ondon <wille> hebbe he wið Godd gemene on domes deig.
Ðyss sint þera manna naman þe ætt þysan cwidan weren, Eadgið se hlefdie, Stigand se archebiscop, Harold eorl, Rengebold cancheler.
